meanings.definition: The state of being a member of a group or organization known as the Colthoods.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sense of belonging after joining the colthoods.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the camaraderie of the colthoods.
meanings.sent3: At the colthoods meeting, they all wore matching hats!
meanings.sent4: Being part of the colthoods is like being part of a big family.
meanings.sent5: The colthoods' unity is as strong as a fortress.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being related to or associated with the Colthoods.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to the colthoods is admirable.
meanings.sent2: The colthoods' influence can be seen in many aspects of the community.
meanings.sent3: Even his dog seems to embrace the colthoods' spirit!
meanings.sent4: Her love for the colthoods shines brighter than the sun.
meanings.sent5: The colthoods' essence permeates every aspect of their lives.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in activities or events organized by the Colthoods.
meanings.sent1: They eagerly awaited the next colthoods gathering.
meanings.sent2: The colthoods always plan fun and engaging events.
meanings.sent3: The colthoods picnic turned into a water balloon fight!
meanings.sent4: Joining the colthoods events is like stepping into a new world.
meanings.sent5: The colthoods' events are full of joy and laughter.
